name: extract_product_name
description: Get the name, type, brand, model or any other details about the product from the body of the input text, only if the user asks to find such a product. It might be entered in Russian, English or Ukrainian language, but keep the extracted words in original one, do not translate to any other.

name.description: Product name, for example "Samsung A30", "iPhone 8" or any other

type.description: Product type, for example "phone", "dishwasher", "ring" or any other

brand.description: Product brand, for example "Samsung", "iPhone" or any other

model.description: Product brand, for example "SE", "8", "A30" or any other

details.description: Product details, for example "64Gb RAM", "5V", "black" or any other
